body_html: Would it be possible to rebuild the Docker images on gcr.io? The underlying nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel uses Ubuntu 16.04 now, but the gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:1.0.0-rc2-devel-gpu image still uses Ubuntu 14.04.
body_text: Would it be possible to rebuild the Docker images on gcr.io? The underlying nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel uses Ubuntu 16.04 now, but the gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:1.0.0-rc2-devel-gpu image still uses Ubuntu 14.04.
body: Would it be possible to rebuild the Docker images on gcr.io? The underlying `nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel` uses Ubuntu 16.04 now, but the `gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:1.0.0-rc2-devel-gpu` image still uses Ubuntu 14.04.
